news.title: New plan to allow customers to cancel mobile and broadband contracts penalty free if providers hike prices
news.summary: Automatic broadband, mobile or TV price hikes may become a thing of the past as the Government gets ready to introduce a law that would allow people to cancel their contracts if prices go up.

news.title: Man who knocked down cottage and replaced it with bungalow without planning permission is granted retention following appeal
news.summary: A man who knocked down a cottage and replaced it with a modern bungalow without planning permission has been granted retention by An Coimisiún Pleanála.

news.title: Taoiseach denies he cut short Angola trip to exert control over restless party at key Fianna Fáil meeting
news.summary: Taoiseach Micheál Martin has dismissed suggestions that he cut short his trip to Angola to exert control over his restless party, and defended the amount of time he is spending abroad.

news.title: How should you spend an inheritance received after the age of 50?
news.summary: They call it the ‘sandwich generation’ ­­­– those people in mid-life who are minding ageing parents while tending to a young family themselves.

news.title: ‘I lost the baby, it was around the time of Ann Lovett… and I couldn’t tell my parents’ – Eleanor McEvoy on the pain of loss and of making her own family
news.summary: ‘Dying is part of life,” Eleanor McEvoy says. The singer-songwriter who rose to fame when she wrote  A Woman’s Heart  is here to talk about performing at Our Lady’s hospice in Harold’s Cross on December 7.

news.title: The Indo Daily : Second time lucky - could Gerry 'The Monk’ Hutch win a seat in the Dáil?
news.summary: The convicted criminal splits his time between Ireland and Lanzarote. Many view him as more of a Robin Hood-style character than a gangland mastermind. He remains under investigation by Spanish authorities.

news.title: Colm Keys: 2026 season shape won’t alter too much but will emerge with provincial draws and new format
news.summary: The shape of the 2026 football inter-county season will become clearer in the coming days with the four provincial championship draws taking place in Croke Park on Thursday night, followed by the adoption of the national fixtures plan by Central Council at the weekend.

news.title: Legal advice: How to protect your right of way when a neighbour sells
news.summary: Query:  Dear Mary Frances, I hope you can advise me because I am in a very troubling situation. I have a field that I can only reach by travelling up a laneway that lies entirely on my neighbour’s property.

news.title: ‘DJ Carey: The Dodger’ review: Docuseries seems to view DJ Carey as a kind of tragic hero
news.summary: There are several old audio clips scattered throughout director Trevor Birney’s two-part docuseries  DJ Carey: The Dodger  (RTE One, Monday, November 24; both episodes on RTÉ Player) that now sound ironic at best, infuriating at worst.

news.title: Almost 1,000 patients who fractured hip last year had to wait for surgery, new audit reveals
news.summary: Almost 1,000 patients who fractured their hip did not receive surgery within the 48-hour target last year, according to an audit. However, the numbers transferred earlier from emergency departments to a theatre or ward have risen.
